Scholar

You are well studied in the ways and histories of the world. You’ve immersed yourself in volumes on many subjects, ranging from languages to maths, sciences, arts, professions, and other skills. You have a wide breadth of knowledge from which to draw, though finding an application for all of it might be difficult.

Ability Score Increase. Your Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma increases by 1. Your Intelligence, Wisdom, or Constitution increases by 1.

Skills. Choose one from: Arcana, History, Investigation, Medicine, Nature, Performance, Religion.

Independent Study. You gain proficiency with any one skill of your choice. @Compendium[5e-stat-decoupled.abilities.WFRS3HWOYGLU0V6Q]{Independent Study}

Tools. You gain proficiency with two of the following: Alchemist’s supplies, Calligrapher’s supplies, Painter’s supplies, Cartographer’s tools, Forgery kit, Poisoner’s kit, Tinker’s tools, Navigator’s tools, or a musical instrument.

Languages. Two of your choice.
